Name: Core Passive: Blade Banner
Additional Ability: Group Set Meal
Descriptions: When Soukaku launches <color=#ffffff>Fly the Flag</color>, her ATK is increased by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> of her initial ATK, up to 500, for 22s. When consuming <color=#ffffff>Vortex</color> during <color=#ffffff>Fly the Flag</color>, the ATK increase is doubled, up to a max of 1,000. This buff can be passed along to characters switching in via <color=#ffffff>Quick Assists</color> or <color=#ffffff>Chain Attacks</color> triggered by <color=#ffffff>Fly the Flag</color>, and it refreshes the duration of the buff.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Soukaku consumes <color=#ffffff>Vortex</color> to activate <color=#ffffff>Fly the Flag</color>, the <color=#98eff0>Ice DMG</color> of the squad is increased by 20% for 22s.

When Soukaku launches <color=#ffffff>Fly the Flag</color>, her ATK is increased by <color=#2BAD00>12.5%</color> of her initial ATK, up to 500, for 22s. When consuming <color=#ffffff>Vortex</color> during <color=#ffffff>Fly the Flag</color>, the ATK increase is doubled, up to a max of 1,000. This buff can be passed along to characters switching in via <color=#ffffff>Quick Assists</color> or <color=#ffffff>Chain Attacks</color> triggered by <color=#ffffff>Fly the Flag</color>, and it refreshes the duration of the buff.

Cons.Name: Uplifting Current
Cons.Effect: When Soukaku triggers <color=#ffffff>Core Passive: Blade Banner</color> or <color=#ffffff>Additional Ability: Group Set Meal</color>, the buff duration is increased by 8s.

Cons.Name: Experimental Charging Module
Cons.Effect:
When Soukaku's <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#ffffff>Dash Attack</color>, <color=#ffffff>Dodge Counter</color>, or <color=#ffffff>Quick Assist</color> hits an enemy, there's a 15% chance she gains 1 stack of <color=#ffffff>Vortex</color>, triggering up to once per second.
When <color=#ffffff>Vortex</color> reaches max stacks, any additional stacks grant Soukaku 1.2 Energy instead.

Cons.Name: Hypothermia
Cons.Effect: If an enemy is hit by <color=#ffffff>Fly the Flag</color>, the target's <color=#98eff0>Ice RES</color> is reduced by 10% for 8s.

Cons.Name: Northern Wind
Cons.Effect: While in the <color=#ffffff>Frosted Banner</color> state, the number of usable enhanced <color=#ffffff>Basic Attacks</color> and enhanced <color=#ffffff>Dash Attacks</color> is increased to 12, and also deal 45% more DMG.
